references.reason: This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models, a foundational concept for many of the methods discussed and compared in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper introduces score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations, which provides the theoretical framework for many diffusion models, including those used in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Improving diffusion models for inverse problems using manifold constraints
references.reason: This paper is a direct predecessor to the current work, focusing on improving diffusion models for inverse problems; the current paper builds upon this work and improves on its limitations.

references.paper_title: Survey of numerical methods for trajectory optimization
references.reason: This paper provides background on optimal control theory and trajectory optimization, the theoretical foundation of the method proposed in the current paper.

references.paper_title: New second-order and first-order algorithms for determining optimal control: A differential dynamic programming approach
references.reason: This paper presents foundational work on differential dynamic programming, a key algorithm used in the current paper's method.
